title: Day 228 (Jeremiah 32-34) - Year 2

description:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- 1 Peter 2:5-9

- Article: A Royal Priesthood in Christ

- Article: Is the Royal Priesthood of all Believers Biblical?

- The Bible Recap - Episode 225
